title: Email newsletters
description: Deadlines, guidelines, best practices, and examples for creating email newsletters.

body.raw:
<Callout>

This site is a work in progress. If you see dummy text on a page or broken links, it means we're still working on it!

</Callout>

## Deadlines

Everything should be held for the Monday school newsletter unless it is an emergency or the deadline is within 1 day.
